text: The Muiderslot is a castle-museum in the Netherlands, in Muiden. It is southeast of Amsterdam. It is one of the better known castles in the Netherlands. ==History== The castle was built in 1280 by Floris V. Pieter Corneliszoon Hooft used to live there. ==References== *Amsterdam Muiderslot Castel Category:Castles in Europe Category:Museums in the Netherlands Category:Gooise Meren Category:13th-century buildings and structures
title: Muiderslot
